item.title: Installing Ansible
item.description: Installing Ansible on Linux, MacOS or Windows Ubuntu Subsystem To install Ansible on Linux or MacOS, see the official documentation provided by Ansible. Install Google Cloud SDK (Optional) If Crunchy PostgreSQL Operator is going to be installed in a Google Kubernetes Environment the Google Cloud SDK is required. To install the Google Cloud SDK on Linux or MacOS, see the official Google Cloud documentation.
